parsed_email.subject: Malteza Voy.33 // Casablanca for discharging
parsed_email.body_text:
Message Number: 767988
From: ops@astraship.com
To: SOMASHIP CASABLANCA (ssomaship@gmail.com)
Cc: ssomaship@gmail.com, MALTEZA (malteza@vessels.astraship.com)
Sent: Friday, Jan 9, 2026 10:40 (UTC +02:00)
Subject: Malteza Voy.33 // Casablanca for discharging

Dear Aziza, 
 
Good Day.
 
Please note that Owners intend to arrange the delivery of 100mt FW, for which kindly revert with availability and related expenses.
 
Best Regards,
Dimitra Ioannidou
Operations Dept.

Astra Shipmanagement Inc
(as agents only)
6 Vouliagmenis Avenue & 12 Nirvana St.
Voula, 166 73
Athens - Greece
Tel: +30 213 0175 106

_________________Original Message_________________

Message: 8383528
From: SOMASHIP CASABLANCA <Somaship Sarl <ssomaship@gmail.com>>
Subject: Re: Malteza Voy.33 // Casablanca for discharging
Date: December 11th 2025, 14:07:01
To: Operations - Astra Shipmanagement Inc <ops@astraship.com>
Cc: Somaship Sarl <ssomaship@gmail.com>
Attachments: SLUDGE REMOVAL CASABLANCA (4).docx

 
Good day,
 
Reference to your below received with many thanks, please note the following:
 
1- Your full style, tel-fax numbers, e-mail address // Name of p.i.c. with mobile and aoh phone nr. in case of emergency.
 

Ms. AZIZA

SOMASHIP s.a.r.l 

Oprs Dept.      

1, Rue d’Avesne & Angle Albert 1er - Tour «A »

10ème Etage, N° 20 - Casablanca

Postal code : 20303

Tél :00.212.522.45.28.66 / 00.212.522.45.05.90

Fax : 00.212.522.45.29.66

Mobile : 00.212.662.08.05.78

E-mail : ssomaship@gmail.com


2- Name of berth at which the vessel will discharge, her prospects for berthing/ completion of discharging and also whether loading operation will be done with ship's cranes/ grabs or by shore facilities.


Vessel must pass on the first by a lightering T3T4 or 62 to reach permissible draft to shift to one of the working pier 20 "SILOS SOSIPO" or pier 60 "SILOS MASS CEREALES"

Discharging oprs will be done with shore crane at pier T3T4 / 62 and with pipes at Silos berth.

Reverting with a berthing prospect once available.

 

3- Availability and related expenses for fresh water supply

 

Supply of FW is possible, cost 07USD per MT

 

4- Availability of reception facilities for sludge/oily water/wash water/sewage/garbage, cost per cbm or ton and procedures for ordering such operation. Please advise if any disposal is compulsory. In addition to this, kindly advise whether the providers are ISO14001 approved.

 

Garbage disposal is included within PDA to be evacuate as per marpol regulation

SLUDGE is free of charge (See attached Order for discharge of sludge to be signed from the Master)


5- Whether crew changes can be done and if so, VISA/ COV-19 requirements for Greek and Filipino seamen.
Kindly advise the ff:
 A) closest/ most convenient airport
 B) the estimated cost for visa/ man
 C) the handling fees for crew change/ man (if any)
 D) the estimated expenses for hotel (if required)
 E) the launch boat cost, if needed and
 F) the transportation costs from the following cases and any additional expenses that may occur and we have not included:
  i)Port to hotel
  ii)Hotel to airport
  iii)Port to airport

 

Crew change is possible at Casablanca port

The nearest airport is : MOHAMED V Casablanca airport (about 01 hours)

Passeport and a seaman's book is required

Launch boat is not allowed at Casablanca port, crew change will join the vessel only once vsl alongside

COVID-19 restrictions: NIL

 

Regarding Greek and Filipino nationality of crew :

No VISA is required, the cost charge is USD180 per crew including : formalities, transportation and our assistance.

OKTB for the on-singers will be arranged once vessel at Casablanca port road (Before berthing)

Hotel accommodation is allowed, the cost for 01 double room is USD 120 (all included) 

Transportation from hotel to port = USD200 per voyage


6- In case we decide to send some spare parts to be delivered on board please provide us with the following information:
 A) what is the nearest airport where we can send the parts
 B) cost per kilo/awb for clearance, transportation, delivery of the spare parts to the vessel
 Since we do not have any exact packing details, please give us some examples:
 for parcels 5/10/20/50kgs ex Korea and for parcels 5/10/20/50kgs ex foreign countries.
 C) time required for all formalities and delivery to the vessel
 D) any specific forwarding procedures
 E) exact shipping instructions
 F) launch boat cost, if needed
 

Spare part to be sent to our address as follow:

SOMASHIP s.a.r.l 

C/O Master of (Name of vessel)

1, Rue d’Avesne & Angle Albert 1er - Tour «A »

10ème Etage, N° 20 - Casablanca

Postal code : 20303

Tél :00.212.522.45.28.66 / 00.212.522.45.05.90

Fax : 00.212.522.45.29.66

E-mail : ssomaship@gmail.com

·  The nearest Airport is "Mohamed V Casablanca" / About 01 hours from airport to Casablanca port.

·  Documents needed : AWB, packing list and invoice

·  The deadline for this spare package to arrive at our office: 48hrs before berthing of vessel. 

·  Formalities will be arranged after berthing of vessel

·  The following cost of Spare Parts is including Customs clearance, formalities, transportation and our assistance), to be paid cash from the Master on board if possible.

parcel 05 kgs-->USD700

parcel 10 kgs-->USD900

parcel 20 kgs-->USD1400

Parcel 50 kgs-->USD1800 

 

7- Please advise the launch boat cost (per trip or per hr) at anchorage (if required) and whether the same launch boat can be arranged for both deliveries (i.e spares/ stores) and attendees (i.e. crew).

 

Actually the launch boat is not authorised as port authorities , spares/stores and crew will be arranged only once our lady is alongside.

8- Whether 'cash to master' can be advanced in u.s. dollars currency and if so please advise bank charges and delivery expenses if any.

 

Please note that CTM can be arranged, see below procedure and cost charges :

 

CTM to be sent to our below account ONLY as follow:

 

ATTIJARIWAFA BANK
AGENCE OMAR RIFFI
41, RUE HADJ OMAR RIFFI
CASABLANCA - MOROCCO
BENEFICIARY NAME          : Mises A Disposition Master of MV .....(STATE VESSEL'S NAME + MASTER'S FULL NAME)........
ACCOUNT NUMBER            : 007 780 0002605000119650 83
SWIFT CODE                          : BCMAMAMC

 

 CTM will be collected directly by the Master against the Master's stamp and passport (due to no visa required for Chinese nationality).

Bank charges & exchange for delivery C.T.M.  : abt 6% (to be included to the CTM)

Our assistance, formalities, transportation (from Casablanca port to bank and vice versa) : USD500 (to be included to the CTM)

 

9- In case we decide to send crew mail/ courier from our offices to the vessel please advise if there are extra charges as well as your address for crew mail.

 

The delivery of crew mail/ courier from our offices to the vessel will be free of charge from our side.

 

Address for crew mail:

SOMASHIP s.a.r.l 

C/O Master of (Name of vessel)

1, Rue d’Avesne & Angle Albert 1er - Tour «A »

10ème Etage, N° 20 - Casablanca

Postal code : 20303

Tél :00.212.522.45.28.66 / 00.212.522.45.05.90

Fax : 00.212.522.45.29.66

E-mail : ssomaship@gmail.com


10- In case we decide to deliver lube oil and/ or fuel oil samples to our testing labs overseas, the samples will be sealed and ready for dispatch via paid DHL.
In this respect, please advise us the cost, if any, of landing the samples bottles and arrange the relevant courier service
 

The delivery of lube oil and/ or fuel oil samples to your testing labs overseas will be free of charge from our side.

To send the shipment to a third party using your DHL account Nbre the "authorization letter signed and stamped from your company" is required by DHL.

 

11- Please advise whether the SSEC can be renewed and if so, please revert with the relevant cost.

 

The renewal of SSCEC is possible at Casablanca port , the cost is USD300 to be paid cash from Master on board if possible.
 

12- Any special regulation, documentary requirements or useful information of which we and or master should be aware in advance.

NIL
 
We remain at your disposal for any further information.
 
Thanks and best regards.
 

Ms. AZIZA

SOMASHIP s.a.r.l 

Oprs Dept.      

1, Rue d’Avesne & Angle Albert 1er - Tour «A »

10ème Etage, N° 20 - Casablanca

Postal code : 20303

Tél :00.212.522.45.28.66 / 00.212.522.45.05.90

Fax : 00.212.522.45.29.66

Mobile : 00.212.662.08.05.78

E-mail : ssomaship@gmail.com

 
Le jeu. 11 déc. 2025 à 10:39, AZIZA <somaship@menara.ma> a écrit :

 

 

De : Operations - Astra Shipmanagement Inc [mailto:ops@astraship.com]
Envoyé : jeudi 11 décembre 2025 09:57
À : somaship@menara.ma
Objet : Malteza Voy.33 // Casablanca for discharging

 

Message Number: 761219

From: ops@astraship.com

To: SOMASHIP CASABLANCA (somaship@menara.ma)

Sent: Thursday, Dec 11, 2025 10:56 (UTC +02:00)

Subject: Malteza Voy.33 // Casablanca for discharging

 

Ref: M/V Malteza ETA Casablanca on 23/12/2025 agw/wp, in order to discharge her cargo.
==============
Good Afternoon,

We are 'Astra Shipmanagement Inc.' a ship management company based in Voula, Athens, Greece.
The under our management M/V Malteza is estimated to arrive at Casablanca on abt. 23rd of December 2025 agw/wp, in order to discharge her cargo under time charter with "OLDENDORFF" who have nominated you as their agents for this call.

Further to all above we would be grateful if you could provide us with following information

1- Your full style, tel-fax numbers, e-mail address // Name of p.i.c. with mobile and aoh phone nr. in case of emergency.

2- Name of berth at which the vessel will discharge, her prospects for berthing/ completion of discharging and also whether loading operation will be done with ship's cranes/ grabs or by shore facilities.

3- Availability and related expenses for fresh water supply

 

4- Availability of reception facilities for sludge/oily water/wash water/sewage/garbage, cost per cbm or ton and procedures for ordering such operation. Please advise if any disposal is compulsory. In addition to this, kindly advise whether the providers are ISO14001 approved.

5- Whether crew changes can be done and if so, VISA/ COV-19 requirements for Greek and Filipino seamen.
Kindly advise the ff:
 A) closest/ most convenient airport
 B) the estimated cost for visa/ man
 C) the handling fees for crew change/ man (if any)
 D) the estimated expenses for hotel (if required)
 E) the launch boat cost, if needed and
 F) the transportation costs from the following cases and any additional expenses that may occur and we have not included:
  i)Port to hotel
  ii)Hotel to airport
  iii)Port to airport

6- In case we decide to send some spare parts to be delivered on board please provide us with the following information:
 A) what is the nearest airport where we can send the parts
 B) cost per kilo/awb for clearance, transportation, delivery of the spare parts to the vessel
 Since we do not have any exact packing details, please give us some examples:
 for parcels 5/10/20/50kgs ex Korea and for parcels 5/10/20/50kgs ex foreign countries.
 C) time required for all formalities and delivery to the vessel
 D) any specific forwarding procedures
 E) exact shipping instructions
 F) launch boat cost, if needed

7- Please advise the launch boat cost (per trip or per hr) at anchorage (if required) and whether the same launch boat can be arranged for both deliveries (i.e spares/ stores) and attendees (i.e. crew).

8- Whether 'cash to master' can be advanced in u.s. dollars currency and if so please advise bank charges and delivery expenses if any.

9- In case we decide to send crew mail/ courier from our offices to the vessel please advise if there are extra charges as well as your address for crew mail.

10- In case we decide to deliver lube oil and/ or fuel oil samples to our testing labs overseas, the samples will be sealed and ready for dispatch via paid DHL.
In this respect, please advise us the cost, if any, of landing the samples bottles and arrange the relevant courier service

11- Please advise whether the SSEC can be renewed and if so, please revert with the relevant cost.

12- Any special regulation, documentary requirements or useful information of which we and or master should be aware in advance.

Your prompt reply to email: ops@astraship.com will be much appreciated.

Thank you very much in advance.

Best Regards,
Dimitra Ioannidou
Operations Dept.

Astra Shipmanagement Inc.
(as agents only)
6 Vouliagmenis Avenue & 12 Nirvana St.
Voula, 166 73
Athens - Greece
Tel: +30 213 0175 106

Prioritizing the wellbeing of our planet and its people.

 

This email may contain confidential and privileged information. Use or disclosure of it by anyone other than an intended recipient is prohibited.
If you received this email in error, please notify the sender immediately by return email and destroy all copies of this email.

 

*Please consider the environment before printing*

classification.summary: Owners intend to arrange the delivery of 100mt of fresh water, and the recipient is asked to revert with availability and expenses.
